data.name: Summer Daze: Tilly's Tale
data.detailed_description:
Sign up for a semester at Hero University, a school where famous adventurers teach young people how to be heroes! Play as Tilly Appleberry, a Rogue student who is being punished after one-too-many pranks. Tilly must make the upcoming Harvest Festival successful, or be forced to leave the University.

Summer Daze: Tilly's Tale takes place one semester before the events of Hero-U: Rogue to Redemption, and features over a dozen characters to befriend and get to know. Meet Rogues, Scientists, Bards, Wizards, Paladins, and Warriors, all with their own stories and goals. Your choices matter - There are multiple endings and hundreds of paths through the game! Play again (and again!) to make friends with more characters and make a more successful festival.



Corey and Lori Cole have been designing games for over 30 years, at Sierra Online and now at their independent studio Transolar Games. They were the pioneers behind the adventure/roleplaying hybrid, combining computer roleplaying games with graphical adventures. They’ve previously worked on the Quest for Glory series, Castle of Doctor Brain, Terry Brooks’s Shannara, and Hero-U: Rogue to Redemption.

Summer Daze: Tilly's Tale is the first game in a series of interactive visual novels set at Hero-U. The focus is on the story and quirky fantasy characters. You'll meet a Minotaur Paladin, a Doggie Chef, and many more potential friends and love interests.

data.short_description: It's up to you to save the Harvest Festival from imminent disaster... or make it even worse! Join Lori and Corey Cole, designers of Quest for Glory, in a new interactive tale set at Hero University. Featuring Zehra Fazal's voice as Tilly Appleberry, a mischievous half-Elven Rogue.
